meanings.definition: A condition characterized by the presence of granules.
meanings.sent1: The granulosis in the soil made it perfect for planting seeds.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the granulosis under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The baker's granulosis of sugar created a unique texture in the cake.
meanings.sent4: The granulosis of stars in the night sky was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The granulosis of sand on the beach sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The granulosis of the sugar made it easy to dissolve in water.
meanings.sent2: The granulosis of the rocks gave them a rough texture.
meanings.sent3: The granulosis of the paint caused an interesting pattern on the wall.
meanings.sent4: The granulosis of the snow resembled tiny diamonds on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The granulosis of the salt enhanced the flavor of the dish.
